Klasse DescriptorData

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.DescriptorData
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
DescriptorData.ddBuffer, DescriptorData.ddImage
public class DescriptorData extends Object
Describes how and what data (like Uniforms or Textures) are passed to the shader. Either a DescriptorData.ddBuffer or a DescriptorData.ddImage with a corresponding type. Descriptor
